Type.Name: HTMLStreamCloseFunc

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void HTMLStreamCloseFunc(HTMLStream stream, HTMLStreamStatus status);
.class public auto ansi sealed HTMLStreamCloseFunc extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: A delegate for use with . Meant to be used for closing the stream.
